sense.def:
A hazard
je nekaj, kar bi nam bilo lahko nevarno.

seg.quote: ...a natural hazard, like an earth tremor.
Drinking alcohol is a real health hazard if carried to excess.

sense.def:
To hazard a guess
pomeni dati predlog, ki je samo ugibanje.

seg.quote: As to the author of the letter, I will hazard a guess that it is Howard.
‘How much do you think he makes a year?’—‘Fifteen thousand,’ Rudolph hazarded.
